job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: summaryltbrgtthe main function of the data scientist is to produce innovative solutions driven by exploratory data analysis from complex and highdimensional datasetsltbrgtworking on commerce products on facebook including marketplace and shopsltbrgtltbrgtskillsltbrgtexperienced in either programming languages such as python andor r big data tools such as hadoop or data visualization tools such as tableaultbrgtthe ability to communicate effectively in writing including conveying complex information and promoting indepth engagement on course topicsltbrgtexperience working with large datasetsltbrgt
